title: Uncharted
description: JacobI'm here to warn You will meet a woman who will change your life.She will make you want things you scoffed at.I didn't think it would happen to me, but one minute changed everything.I wish I was prepared. If I were, I wouldn't have lost her.The heartbreak of losing your soulmate is one of the worst pains I've ever felt.I should campaign and warn the young people.Vaccinate against love because if you lose it, you could lose yourself for the rest of your life.Some may say I'm being dramatic.But you'll see.PriaAll my life Iâ€™ve never been alone, but always felt lonely.I stayed by my mother's side until her last breath, and my father's until his last memories dissipated. My sister is the last one standing, but her life is a miracle that can end at any given moment.Today, my options on how to live my life are endless, yet my heart and my best friend limit them. So, I stay in Seattle, close to the one person who will never truly let me inside his world.He has a bad boy attitude and a heart bigger than the ocean.But will he ever make space in his heart for me?
author: Claudia Y. Burgoa
